title: OFF META PICK? REPORT
body:
come on, its 2016. we've all seen some weird shit that has worked. stop being a bunch of raging crybaby because someone picked off meta. 


so sick of these fucking pricks.

replies.body:
Going hard for 6 years of picking offmeta. Got reported like 25% of my games. never even a warning from riot. 

So seriously people, save yourself some time, and effort. Don't bother reporting off meta picks. It's not going to work.
I did a Twisted Fate Tank Support once. http://plays.tv/s/L0YBaROHO0-o  My team couldn't report me afterwards, I had gotten an S+
Lol, just wait for that one player that hasn't been paying attention untill the 30 minute mark.  Best reaction ever from top lane Nasus, "wait, we dont have an ADC"  lol
Nothing new, just play and laugh... usually I do whatever and laugh while they are raging it intertains me

> [{quoted}](name=Jigglypuff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9avZvTA5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-01T16:19:10.197+0000)
>
> Nothing new, just play and laugh... usually I do whatever and laugh while they are raging it intertains me

Same.. and I'm a Blumo Support.
